mainboard.name: Knight of the Ebon Legion
mainboard.oracle_text:
{2}{B}: This creature gets +3/+3 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. (Damage causes loss of life.)

mainboard.name: Ignoble Hierarch
mainboard.oracle_text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

mainboard.name: Bloodghast
mainboard.oracle_text:
This creature can't block.
This creature has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Lotus Cobra
mainboard.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, add one mana of any color.

mainboard.name: Tarmogoyf
mainboard.oracle_text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

mainboard.name: Inexorable Blob
mainboard.oracle_text: Delirium — Whenever this creature attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, create a 3/3 green Ooze creature token that's tapped and attacking.

mainboard.name: Stalactite Stalker
mainboard.oracle_text:
Menace
At the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere.)
{2}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power.

mainboard.name: Viscera Seer
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

mainboard.name: Satyr Wayfinder
mainboard.oracle_text: When this creature enters, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

mainboard.name: Eternal Witness
mainboard.oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Mire Triton
mainboard.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When this creature enters, mill two cards and you gain 2 life. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

mainboard.name: Arasta of the Endless Web
mainboard.oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

mainboard.name: Kraul Harpooner
mainboard.oracle_text:
Reach
Undergrowth — When this creature enters, choose up to one target creature you don't control with flying. This creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have this creature fight that creature.

mainboard.name: Cunning Lethemancer
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.

mainboard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

mainboard.name: Utopia Sprawl
mainboard.oracle_text:
Enchant Forest
As this Aura enters, choose a color.
Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

mainboard.name: The Binding of the Titans
mainboard.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Each player mills three cards.
II — Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. For each creature card exiled this way, you gain 1 life.
III — Return target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Ulcerate
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

mainboard.name: Verdant Catacombs
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Overgrown Tomb
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

mainboard.name: Traverse the Ulvenwald
mainboard.oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, instead search your library for a creature or land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Explore
mainboard.oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Edge of Autumn
mainboard.oracle_text:
If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainboard.name: Life from the Loam
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

mainboard.name: Black Sun's Zenith
mainboard.oracle_text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

mainboard.name: Bone Shards
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

sideboard.name: Mayhem Devil
sideboard.oracle_text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.

sideboard.name: Dreadhorde Arcanist
sideboard.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to this creature's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

sideboard.name: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
sideboard.oracle_text: Whenever Krenko attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

sideboard.name: Song of the Dryads
sideboard.oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent is a colorless Forest land.

sideboard.name: Wilderness Reclamation
sideboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, untap all lands you control.

sideboard.name: Opt
sideboard.oracle_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
Draw a card.

sideboard.name: Crop Rotation
sideboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

sideboard.name: Shelldock Isle
sideboard.oracle_text:
Hideaway 4 (When this land enters, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{U}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.

sideboard.name: Temple Garden
sideboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

sideboard.name: Stomping Ground
sideboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.

sideboard.name: Tezzeret, Betrayer of Flesh
sideboard.oracle_text:
The first activated ability of an artifact you activate each turn costs {2} less to activate.
+1: Draw two cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
−2: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature. If it isn't a Vehicle, it has base power and toughness 4/4.
−6: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact you control becomes tapped, draw a card."

sideboard.name: Spider Food
sideboard.oracle_text: Destroy up to one target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")

sideboard.name: Blackmail
sideboard.oracle_text: Target player reveals three cards from their hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.

sideboard.name: Call of the Herd
sideboard.oracle_text:
Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

sideboard.name: Raven's Crime
sideboard.oracle_text:
Target player discards a card.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

sideboard.name: Abundant Harvest
sideboard.oracle_text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
